title: Determining Cases in Which Proportions Are Appropriate
question_text:
Which of the following situations involve sample proportions?
I. Sample $100\text{ subjects}$ and record their weights.
II. Sample $100\text{ subjects}$ and ask if they approve of the current president.
III. Sample $100\text{ subjects}$ and ask if they own at least one pet.
solution:
Statement I is false; this is a sample mean since the variable weight has an infinite amount of possibilities.

Statements II and III are true; these involve yes or no answers, and therefore deal with proportions.

Thus, the correct answer is Choice 'E'.
